talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>{ui_string:1200001}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200002}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200003}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200004}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200005}</html>

$Adventurer David$
I, Adventurer David, am envied by many people in this world!
And you just one among those people! Ha. Ha. Ha.

$???$
(A wing fragment surrounded by a dark and evil energy.
Blood stain is splattered around it)

$Bishop Ignacio$
This might annoy you a little, but there is just one thing I would like you to check......
Will you do me another favor? I'm asking you because there aren't many people that I could trust besides you.

$Adventurer David$
I, Adventurer David, am envied by many people in this world!
And you just one among those people! Ha. Ha. Ha.

$Bishop Ignacio${action:Talk}
It's about the Black Dragon. Although the Gold Dragon may be protecting this place, didn't you say that the two dragons were nearly equal when they were fighting the other time?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Geraint also mentioned about the same thing</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Bishop Ignacio$
Although the Black Dragon has been said to have fallen down the cliff with broken wings, that wouldn't have been enough to kill it. I may be worrying unnecessarily, but... The Black Dragon could still be alive somehwere, and he could be healing his wounds...

$Bishop Ignacio$
Hehe... Is that so? Hmm, it would be terrible if the Black Dragon were to appear again. I am concerned... Something must be done.
The Black Dragon could be hiding somewhere, so we must find out.

$Bishop Ignacio$
Please scout the Black Dark Overlord's Tower.
All you have to do is go into the innermost area of the place, and check if there any particular signs of anything.

$???$
(A wing fragment surrounded by a dark and evil energy.
Blood stain could be found splattered around it)

$Bishop Ignacio${action:Talk}
Please scout the Dark Overlord Keep Tower. I am worried that the Black Dragon may be hiding somewhere.
Just go into the innermost are, and check if there are any particular signs.

$Adventurer David${action:Stand01}
I wasn't waiting for you, but since you're here anyway, I will talk to you!
Ha. Ha. Ha. You should be honored!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I just trying to ask why are you still here whereby Argenta had already left?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Adventurer David$
Why am I here? Why do you ask something that has an obvious answer? Ha. Ha. Ha.
You didn't fOgret about who I am, did you? I am the one and only slave of Argenta! Her eternal companion!
I am D.A.V.I.D.!

$Adventurer David$
W-what? Argenta has left?
{user_nick}! What are you talking about? Argenta has left?! She left?!?!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Were you too late to complete her errand?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Adventurer David$
I was just taking a rest while I was doing an errand for Argenta. A very brief rest! But I can't believe Argenta could leave me like that... I can't believe it...!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>She said she was going to Lotus Marsh.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Adventurer David$
Huh! (Adventurer David pretends to be indifferent.)
First... I would like to ask you something. Where did Argenta go?
Of... Of course I know where she went! Indeed I know, but... *Cough*!

$Adventurer David$
Then it is not too late, I would still be able to catch up with her if i immediately take a ship from Hermalte Port to Lotus Marsh. Ha.
Just wait for me, oh, Argenta!
I am going! (He is crying out like a cow.)

$Adventurer David${action:Stand01}
Argh! ...Arrr... W-what should I do...
(Adventurer David is nervous.)
T-this is all your fault!!

$Adventurer David$
Are you really not aware? Because of you, my Argenta had no choice but to... My beautiful , lovely , and delicate Argenta had to leave me because of you!
She had to leave all alone!
You're so cold-blooded!

$Adventurer David${action:Stand01}
Just help me! Alright? It seems like you have something urgent to take care of first, so come to me after you have gotten it done! Don't fOgret!
...... Promise me! (He shouts mournfully.)

$Adventurer David$
What's taking so long?
Finish your task quickly and come see me!
Poor Argenta is probably waiting for me in tears at this moment!

$???$
(A black wing surrounded by an evil energy.
Blood Stains could be found splattering around.)

$???$
(It's Black Dragon's Broken wing. It must have gotten rip off in it's fight against the Gold Dragon. Bloond stain could be found but no traces of him)

$Adventurer David$
What's taking so long? Finish your current task quickly and come see me!
Poor Argenta is probably waiting for me in tears at this moment!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I have found Black Dragon's broken wings.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Bishop Ignacio$
You're back. Did you find any traces of the Black Dragon?
I was so worried while you were gone...
I was praying for your safety while your away

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Yes. But I did not see the Black Dragon.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Bishop Ignacio$
Black Dragon's wings...?
So this was found near the tower...

$Bishop Ignacio${action:Talk}
Is that so...?
I would have felt relieved if his body was found, but I guess I would be asking for too much. Hmm...

$Bishop Ignacio$
Oh, and does this Pendant belong to you?
(The Bishop takes something out and shows you.)
It was dropped around this area after you had left. I pick it up before the servants could

$Bishop Ignacio$
It seemed like Geraint's Pendant, which you showed me before. It's an important item, so store it carefully.
<html>$Quest Reward$</html>

$Black Dragon's Wing Fragment$
(Black Dragon's broken wing.
It is surrounded by a dark and evil energy.)

journal.title: The Bishop's Worries
journal.contents:
It seems like Bishop Ignacio has more to say.

Saint Haven Royal Castle → Bishop Ignacio

journal.title: Scout Orders
journal.contents:
Bishop Ignacio is worried that the Black Dragon might be hiding somewhere. Scout the Dark Overlord's Tower.

Foothills of Black Mountain (Dark Overlord Gates) → Dark Overlord's Tower
journal.todo_msg: Please investigate the Dark Overlord's Tower.

journal.title: The Man who is Watching
journal.contents:
At Foothills of Black Mountain, you found Adventurer David, who was looking at your direction. If you just pass him by, he will come chase you, so just go and talk to him first.

Foothills of Black Mountain(Dark Overlord Gates) → Adventurer David
journal.todo_msg: You had found Adventurer David, please talk to him

journal.title: What you must do first
journal.contents:
First, go investigate the Dark Overlord's Tower. You should talk to Adventurer David after you have first gotten the job done.

Foothills of Black Mountain (Dark Overlord keep's Gates) → Dark Overlord's Tower

journal.title: Please feel relieved
journal.contents:
After investigating you could only find Black Dragon's Wing Fragment. You were not able to find any other actual traces of the Black Dragon. Return to Bishop Ignacio.

Saint Haven Royal Castle → Bishop Ignacio
journal.todo_msg: You have finished investigating. Report to Bishop Ignacio.
